description.en_US: Spin up a playful wind dance alongside Hazel to sweep up enemies and finish off with a massive windstorm.
Catch enemies ahead with a radiant spear thrust before calling on Gynthar's powers to unleash a grand starstorm. Prior usage of elemental sacred weapons boosts attack power.
Conjure a ring of Jellectris Type-B's vivid paints, spreading paint upon dashing and firing beams when throwing charged shots. The paint used varies by current elemental mode.
Brandish the blade of E'nel and lunge forward before dicing hit enemies with a rapid flurry of slices.
Surrounding yourself in the flames of Master Magmoth, ascend upwards before diving forwards and striking the ground with a ferocious impact.
Wield the hammer of Di'aro and hurl it downwards from above to send a chilling message at foes below while obstructing enemy attacks and projectiles.
Launch forth one of H.F.S. Driller X01's forbidden super bombs to summon falling icicles and eventually detonate in a devastating cross of ice spikes.
Lunge forward with a flash slash before unleashing the spiteful electricity of Plasma Phantom onto stricken foes and finishing off with thunder.
Swoop swiftly forward with K'win's claw to assault an enemy with a mesmerizing dance before restraining enemies ahead with thrown daggers.
Perfectly guard an enemy attack before retaliating with a shock saw attack and mustering the wrathful, dazing thunderbolts of the Son of the East.
Catch enemies in front of you with wave slashes before diving into the ground and unleashing the Ancient Guardian's massive bulk onto nearby enemies.
Envelop yourself in a protective bubble while channeling the devastating torrents of Sir Blobus Starnikus to drain health from nearby enemies.
Conjure a ring of familiars and lock onto an enemy in view before unleashing forth a methodical barrage of Go'ni's cards.
